title: Ron's story
creator_credit: Davide Grassi, Aldo Ivancic and Ron Athey
brief_description: Ron’s Story is a video based on the work and obsessions of Los Angeles-based extreme performance artist Ron Athey. The video is comprised of footage filmed at various performances staged at the Kapelica Gallery and the Cultural Centre Cankarjev dom in Ljubljana between 1996 and 2001.
